name: The Hunger Games
description: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death. A gripping tale of survival and rebellion.

name: Atomic Habits
description: A proven framework for improving every day. James Clear reveals practical strategies to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
description: A coming-of-age mystery set in the marshes of North Carolina. Kya Clark, the 'Marsh Girl,' is suspected of murder, but her story is one of resilience and hope.

name: Educated
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

name: The Silent Patient
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then never speaks another word. A psychotherapist is determined to get her to talk and unravel the mystery.

name: Becoming
description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States. Michelle Obama chronicles the experiences that have shaped her.

name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life, Mark Manson shows us that the key to being happier is to care less about more and more about less.

name: The Alchemist
description: A fable about following your dream, The Alchemist has inspired a devoted following around the world. Santiago's journey teaches us about listening to our hearts.

name: It Ends with Us
description: A moving and powerful novel about love, resilience, and making difficult choices. Lily Bloom's story is both heartbreaking and hopeful.

name: The Four Agreements
description: A practical guide to personal freedom, The Four Agreements presents a code of conduct based on ancient Toltec wisdom that can transform our lives.
